item.title: Teleport emote[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @14harry14 14harry14
item.description:
@14harry14 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:6, topic:342681”]triggerTele(CoordX, CoordY, HeightLevel);
The heightlevel is pretty much the ‘floors’ of the game, unless your destination is on another floor(Second story or so,ething) of the game, the height is 0.

triggerTele(3093, 3493, 0); // Yours [/quote]

Oh… Understand Thanks

But back to the main question… HOW DO I ADD A TELEPORTING EMOTE!?!

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport emote[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

triggerTele(CoordX, CoordY, HeightLevel);

The heightlevel is pretty much the ‘floors’ of the game, unless your destination is on another floor(Second story or so,ething) of the game, the height is 0.

triggerTele(3093, 3493, 0);  // Yours

item.title: Teleport emote[SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @14harry14 14harry14
item.description:
@14harry14 wrote:

Hi!
Been trying for quite some time now, but i still cant figure it out

My code is:

[code]}
if (command.startsWith(“home”) && (playerRights >= 0)){
toX = 3093;
toY = 3493;
sM(“You teleport to home.”);
}

}[/code]

I have the emote list, but i do also need help with the delay thingy… If that is necessary while teleporting with emote…

Hope to hear from u guys soon

Read full topic
